name: Frisky Business: Episode 2
description:
Virginia McGee, a nurse at a local hospital, has been murdered. When the police's investigation goes cold, her father turns to Frisk Investigative Solutions for help, and justice. As you gather evidence, you may begin to question whether or not the murderer is even from this world…


THE FRISK FACTOR
Get Frisky! Meet girls, go on dates, have a fling, fall in love, collect selfies, and more. Just try to remember... there's a case to be solved!

The Prudent Detective
Gather clues, interview suspects, and make the decision on who gets the cuffs in the end. Leverage your team and your skills to find out who is the real killer!

Improve Yourself to Get the Girl
Will you head to the gym to impress the ladies or go out on the town? Increase your stats or wing it? So many girls, so little time!

HUGE LOADS of Decisions, Multiple Endings
Be careful what you say and do, as your choices have a direct impact on how the story unfolds. Try to unlock the True Ending!

Bigger, Longer, Sexier
With more locations, characters, and GIRLS, GIRLS, GIRLS than ever before, this is Falco Frisk’s biggest case yet!
